statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 3 \\ 0 \\ -2 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -1 \\ -2 \\ 3 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -11 \\ 2 \\ 5 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -1 \\ -3 \\ 2 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 9 \\ -15 \\ 14 \\ -2 \\ 0 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
